content.query:
-- query da riutilizzare
SELECT
    DATENAME(MONTH, dateTime) AS monthname
    ,dataType
    ,dataSubtype
    ,subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2020/month=*/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY DATENAME(MONTH, dateTime), dataType, dataSubtype, subcategory;
--  Total size of data scanned is 54 megabytes, Total execution time: 00:00:43.610
